title: Colorado Rapids v Portland Timbers: Neville urges visitors to find ruthless edge
description: Phil Neville has urged the Portland Timbers to be more ruthless in closing out games, with the Colorado Rapids next up in MLS. The Timbers have endured a rough start to the 2025 season, winning just one of their four games so far, leaving them 12th in the Western Conference. title: De la Fuente not counting on home advantage in Netherlands second leg
description: Luis de la Fuente said it would be difficult to beat the Netherlands in their Nations League quarter-final after Spain snatched a point in the first leg of their clash on Thursday. Nico Williams had fired the holders ahead in the ninth minute only for goals in either half from Cody Gakpo and Tijjani Reijnders […] The post De la Fuente not counting on home advantage in Netherlands second leg appeared first on Soccer News.
